naslov: Seget Vranjica, elegantna stambena zgrada s 4 stana, pogled, 282 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Iznimno dotjerana dvojna stambena kuća u Seget Vranjici, vrlo blizu mora i plaže. Uzdiže se na dvije etaže s 282 kvadrata bruto stambenog prostora, čvrste i kvalitetne gradnje, izdašno opremljena i u cijelosti namještena. Po dva su stana smještena na svakoj etaži, a svaki se sastoji od kuhinje i blagovaonice kao jedne prostorije, spavaće sobe i kupaonice. Stanovi u prizemlju još obuhvaćaju i ostavu a stanovi na prvom katu balkon i natkrivenu terasu. Stan S2 u prizemlju također uključuje i zaseban dnevni boravak, dok stan S4 na katu i dodatnu manju spavaću sobu. Kuću krasi i pogled na more s kata. Instalirani su solarni paneli i bojler za grijanu vodu, po dva klima uređaja u svakom stanu, odlična alu stolarija s dvoslojnim izo-staklima i komarnicima na svim prozorima, bežični internet, internet televizija sa pametnim TV uređajem u svakom stanu, kvalitetni laminati u spavaćim sobama i keramičke pločice u ostalim prostorima, roštilj i sustav video nadzora. Vodilo se brige o svim detaljima, pa je tako postavljena prvoklasna zvučna izolacija prema susjedu tako da nema nikakve buke, tu su dvije velike i dvije male kapije od lijevanog željeza, provedena je trofazna struja za postavljanje termoakumulacijske peći ili protočnog bojlera po želji, dva crijeva za zalijevanje vrta i tako dalje. Nedavno je rezidencija i renovirana, obnovljena je vanjska fasada, unutarnji zidovi i stropovi, postavljeni novi laminati, tuš kabine i nešto novog namještaja i opreme. Nekretnina je opasana s pažljivo razrađenim i brižno održavanim vrtom, tako su tu tri stabla limuna, kumkvat, tri mandarine, naranča, grejpfrut, jedno stablo hibrid između limuna i grejpfruta, tri palme, dvije bugenvilije i nekoliko kineskih mimoza. Kuća je odlično prometno povezana, pripada vrlo atraktivnom okruženju mirnog i tihog predjela Seget Vranjice, sa svim potrebnim dodatnim sadržajima u blizini, uključujući i šetnicu uz more s restoranima, kafićima i konobama s tradicionalnom ponudom jela i pića. --- Exceptionally elegant semi-detached house in Seget Vranjica, very close to the sea and the beach. It rises on two floors with 282 square meters of gross living space, of firm and high-quality construction, generously equipped and fully furnished. There are two apartments situated on each floor, and each consists of kitchen and dining room as one unit, bedroom and bathroom. Ground floor apartments also include a storage room, and first floor apartments entail a balcony and a covered terrace. Apartment S2 on the ground floor additionally includes a separate living room, while apartment S4 on the first floor an additional smaller bedroom. The house also features sea view from the first floor. Solar panels and a hot water boiler were installed, two air conditioning units in each apartment, excellent aluminium carpentry with double-layer insulating glass and mosquito nets on all windows, wireless Internet, Internet television with a smart TV in each apartment, quality laminates in the bedrooms and ceramic tiles in other areas, grill and video surveillance system. All the details were taken care of, so first-class sound insulation was laid down towards the neighbor so that there is no noise at all, there are two large and two small cast iron gates, three-phase electricity was brought for the installation of a storage heater or tankless water heater as desired, two hoses for watering the garden and so on. The residence was recently renovated, the exterior facade, interior walls and ceilings were renewed, new laminates, shower cabins and some new furniture and equipment were installed. The property is surrounded by a carefully designed and carefully maintained garden, so there are three lemon trees, kumquat, three tangerines, an orange tree, a grapefruit tree, one lemon and grapefruit hybrid tree, three palm trees, two bougainvilleas and several Chinese mimosas. The house is well road networked, it is a part of a very attractive, peaceful and quiet area of Seget Vranjica, with all the necessary additional facilities nearby, including a promenade by the sea with restaurants, cafes and taverns with traditional offer of food and drinks.
